timeline.message:
[#3652] attempt to fix NPE

Co-authored-by: Iván Perdomo <ivan@akvo.org>

timeline.bodyText: There are lots of changes to import style and order that are not directly to the change business logic change we want.
timeline.author: iperdomo

replies.bodyText: the IDE does this, we need a common code style for all IDEs so this does not happen
replies.author: valllllll2000

replies.bodyText: it does it with you reformat the whole file. We had a common style defined for Eclipse but not for IntelliJ IDEA
replies.author: iperdomo

timeline.bodyText: IDEM. Import re-ordering, not directly related to business logic changes.
timeline.author: iperdomo

timeline.bodyText: We're changing the logic and introduce a corner case. We should add a test in SurveyInstanceDAOTest
timeline.author: iperdomo

timeline.message: [#3652] Adds test for data points with no registration form instance
